blueprint.description: Installs qBittorrent on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [qBittorrent](https://www.qbittorrent.org/) is a cross-platform free and open-source BitTorrent client. qBittorrent is a native application written in C++. It uses Boost, Qt 5 toolkit, and libtorrent-rasterbar library. Its optional search engine is written in Python.
blueprint.name: qBittorrent
blueprint.title: qBittorrent
